How do I launch a new token, such as GOLD, on the Verus network, and what are the requirements for doing so? Additionally, how can I create a new token, like mycoin, that can be converted from GOLD or VRSCTEST?

To launch a new token, such as GOLD, on the Verus network, you need to fund a currency launch transaction with at least 10 VRSCTEST. This transaction will initiate a currency launch that will start 50 blocks from when it was made (by default). The launch requires 1000 VRSCTEST to be preconverted at a rate of 0.01 VRSCTEST per GOLD.

Here's how it works: when you send the transaction to launch the GOLD token, it will be mined into a block, and the mining process will earn the 0.025% conversion fees of participation in the launch, converting VRSCTEST to GOLD.

Before the GOLD token launches, you can park your conversion by sending a command like:
```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
This will effectively park your conversion until the token launches, at which point, you will either find 0.975 GOLD in your wallet, or you will have your VRSCTEST back.

Once the GOLD token has launched, you can create a new token, like mycoin, that can be converted from GOLD or VRSCTEST. To do this, you can define the properties of mycoin using a command like:
```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST definecurrency '{"name":"mycoin","options":33, "proofprotocol":2,"currencies":["vrsctest", "gold"],"minpreconversion":[10000,5.1298]}, "initialsupply":20000'
```
This command defines a new token named "mycoin" with specific properties, such as the currencies it can be converted from, the minimum amounts required for conversion, and its initial supply.

After it launches, the only way at present to create new tokens is with a centralized issuance option. To convert VRSCTEST to GOLD, you could issue the command:
```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
that would effectively park my conversion until the token launches, at which point, I will either find 0.975 GOLD in my wallet, or I will have my VRSCTEST back.
